'''Bounty of the Earth''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[The Hero's Journey]]''. The achievements are earned by collecting rewards from [[Ley Line Blossoms]].

==Achievements==
{{Achievements by Category Table|Bounty of the Earth}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* Unlike the [[Battle Pass]] weekly mission, the rewards must be collected using [[Resin]].
* Using [[Condensed Resin]] will only cause the counter to go up by 1 instead of 2, even though twice the amount of resin was used.
